title: Can We Revert Elise Nerfs Now That You Made Tanks Fucking Broken?
body: I want to play her but she is garbage.

replies.body: {{item:3153}} tank meta ain't nothing but a thing. Game is balanced, it's up to a team to prioritize and make smart picks in draft. That's the point of draft.

Tanks aren't broken, build an MR item if thornmail is killing you since very few champs that build thornmail will have magic pen.

While Elise does need some help, claiming she deserves buffs just because you mistakenly believe tanks are broken is dumb.
Tanks aren't broken. Elise is just a caster minion with 8 legs

If Riot fix the Magus enhancement to the AP junglers can put in better spot champs like Elise, Diana, Fiddlestick, Nidalee and Eve that are the principal's users of the Magus enhancement. 

Now talking about the Magus, the problem is the Mana, All the AP junglers need cat spells to clear fast, but this means oom so fast, after the blue buff ends, the AP junglers start to loses his mana so fast, and the build path of Magus don't help in anything a Fiendish Codex is not the solution, maybe a item like Sheen can help better the AP junglers and put a new passive into magus.

Play tank/magicpen Elise? Cinderhulk, Liandry's, penetration boots, more tank....fits the meta and helps out the fact that she doesn't scale.
